product_name: CatEye HL-AU230 Jido Front Bike Light
long_description: Offering convenient lighting, the CatEye HL-AU230 Jido front bike light features sensors which automatically turn the light on when it's dark or when you start riding. In auto mode, built-in sensors automatically turn the light on whenever darkness and motion are detected; light will stay on for 40 seconds after you've stopped riding. Switching between auto and manual modes is easy, allowing you to control battery usage or enhance visibility when it's still light out. Runs approximately up to 30 hrs. on constant mode and up to 60 hrs. on flashing mode. Flex-Tight(TM) universal mounting bracket attaches securely to just about any size handlebar; no tools required. Low battery indicator lets you know when it's time to replace batteries. The CatEye HL-AU230 Jido front bike light runs on 4 AA batteries, included.
short_description: Offering convenient lighting, the CatEye HL-AU230 Jido front bike light features sensors which automatically turn the light on when it's dark or when you start riding.
